name: sauce_demo_website_automation_using_playwright
description: An Test Automation Project of an E-Commerce based demo website using Playwright, JavaScript, Page Object Model (POM) Pattern, HTML Reports, Data Driven Testing using JSON file and many more.

scripts.test: npm run clearAllure && npm run runTests
scripts.generateAllure: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && npx allure open allure-report
